data.subject: Temple (Acoustic Ver.)
data.lyric:
We wanted to remember everything that we'd forgotten
 We wanted to believe that we were not fading

data.subject: On A Midnight Street (Acoustic Ver.)
data.lyric:
I'm lost on an evening tide
 a red ocean into a northern sky
 and the deep water moves like gray rib

data.subject: Graveyard Parade (Acoustic Ver.)
data.lyric:
Bloodshot moon rising
 In this graveyard parade
 Red sun tumbling
 Through a passing charade
 
 You'

data.subject: Elijah (Acoustic Ver.)
data.lyric:
Broken by the back of it
 It was hard enough without the loss
 Hanging on a thread of it
 It was har
